flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: È il Pokémon più pigro del mondo, ma può sprigionarendi colpo una quantità spaventosa di energia a lungonrepressa.
Es el Pokémon más vago que hay. Aun así, puedenliberar de una vez una cantidad tremenda de energíanacumulada.
SLAKING spends all day lying down andnlolling about.nIt eats grass growing within its reach.fIf it eats all the grass it can reach,nthis POKéMON reluctantly moves tonanother spot.
Wherever SLAKING live, rings of overna yard in diameter appear in grassynfields. They are made by the POKéMONfas it eats all the grass within reachnwhile lying prone on the ground.
Hordes of SLAKING gather around treesnwhen fruits come into season. They waitnaround patiently for ripened fruits to fallnout of the trees.
It is the world’s most slothful POKéMON.nHowever, it can exert horrifying power bynreleasing pent-up energy all at once.
It is the world’s most slothful POKéMON.nHowever, it can exert horrifying power bynreleasing pent-up energy all at once.
The world’s laziest Pokémon. Whennit is lounging, it is actually savingnenergy for striking back.
The world’s laziest Pokémon. Whennit is lounging, it is actually savingnenergy for striking back.
The world’s laziest Pokémon. Whennit is lounging, it is actually savingnenergy for striking back.
The world’s laziest Pokémon.nIt moves to another spot when there’snno food left within its reach.
The world’s laziest Pokémon.nIt moves to another spot when there’snno food left within its reach.
Le Pokémon le plus fainéant dunmonde. Il s’allonge pour économisernses forces et contre-attaquer.
The world’s laziest Pokémon. Whennit is lounging, it is actually savingnenergy for striking back.
Le Pokémon le plus fainéant dunmonde. Il s’allonge pour économisernses forces et contre-attaquer.
The world’s laziest Pokémon. Whennit is lounging, it is actually savingnenergy for striking back.
This Pokémon lives lying on its side.nIt only rolls over and moves whennthere is no more grass to eat.
This Pokémon lives lying on its side.nIt only rolls over and moves whennthere is no more grass to eat.
せかいいち　ぐうたらな　ポケモン。nてが　とどく　はんいの　エサをnたべつくすと　いばしょを　かえる。
세계에서 제일 게으른 포켓몬이다.n손이 닿는 범위의 먹이를n다 먹으면 있는 거처를 바꾼다.
Le Pokémon le plus fainéant du monde. Il bougenquand il a mangé tout ce qui était à portée de main.
Das faulste Pokémon der Welt. Es bewegt sich nur,nwenn alles Essbare in Reichweite verputzt ist.
El Pokémon más perezoso del mundo. Cambia de lugarnpara coger la comida al alcance de su mano.
Il più pigro Pokémon del mondo. Si sposta solonquando non ha più cibo a portata di mano.
The world’s laziest Pokémon. It moves to anothernspot when there’s no food left within its reach.
世界一　ぐうたらな　ポケモン。n手が　届く　範囲の　エサをn食べつくすと　居場所を　替える。
せかいいちの　ぐうたらだが　たまったnエネルギーを　いっきに　だす　ことでnおそろしい　パワーを　はっきする。
세계에서 제일 게으르지만n쌓인 에너지를 한 번에 내면n무서울 정도의 파워를 발휘한다.
C’est le Pokémon le plus paresseux du monde.nIl est cependant capable de libérer une puissancenphénoménale en une seule attaque.
Es ist das faulste Pokémon der Welt. Doch kann esnüberaus kräftige Angriffe fahren, wenn es dienkomplette angestaute Energie auf einmal einsetzt.
It is the world’s most slothful Pokémon. However,nit can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-upnenergy all at once.
世界一の　ぐうたらだが　たまったnエネルギーを　一気に　出す　ことでn恐ろしい　パワーを　発揮する。
１にちじゅう　ねそべったまま　くらす　ポケモン。nての　とどく　ばしょに　はえている　くさを　たべnくさが　なくなると　しぶしぶ　ばしょを　かえる。
온종일 엎드려 누워 지내는 포켓몬이다.n손이 닿는 장소에 난 풀을 먹으며n풀이 없어지면 마지못해 장소를 옮긴다.
Monaflèmit passe toute sa journée allongé à paresser.nIl mange toute l’herbe qu’il trouve à portée de main.nEnsuite, il change d’endroit, à contrecœur.

Letarking verbringt den Tag damit, herumzuliegen und nichtsnzu tun. Es ernährt sich von Gras, das in seiner Reichweitenwächst. Hat es alles aufgefressen, so sucht es sich widerwillignein anderes Plätzchen.
Slaking se pasa todo el día tumbado vagueando. Se come lanhierba que tiene a su alcance y, una vez que ha acabado connella, se va de mala gana a otro sitio.
Slaking passa tutto il giorno disteso pigramente, mangiandonl’erba che cresce a portata di mano. Dopo aver esauritonl’erba vicino a sé, si sposta controvoglia in un altro luogo.
Slaking spends all day lying down and lolling about. It eatsngrass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it cannreach, this Pokémon reluctantly moves to another spot.
１日中　寝そべったまま　暮らす　ポケモン。n手の　届く　場所に　生えている　草を　食べn草が　なくなると　しぶしぶ　場所を　変える。
そうげんに　きざまれた　はんけい　１メートルのnわっかは　ケッキングが　ねそべったまま　まわりのnくさを　たべつくして　できた　ものだ。
초원에 새겨진 반경 1m의n둥근 띠 모양은 게을킹이 누운 채로n주변의 풀을 먹어치워 생긴 것이다.

On trouve parfois des cercles de plus de 1 m de rayonntotalement désherbés dans les plaines. Ils sont faitsnpar les Monaflèmit qui passent leurs journées allongésnà manger toute l’herbe à portée de main.
Wo dieses Letarking lebt, hinterlässt es Kreise von 1 m Radiusnauf den Wiesen. Es frisst nämlich all das Gras, das in seinernReichweite wächst. Dabei liegt es bäuchlings auf dem Boden.
Cuando Slaking se instala a vivir en una zona, aparecenncírculos de un metro de radio de terreno baldío, pues sencome todo el césped que pilla mientras está tumbado bocanabajo.
Dove vive Slaking, si formano anelli del raggio di 1 m neinprati erbosi. Infatti, quando questo Pokémon si stendenprono al suolo, mangia tutta l’erba che riesce a raggiungere.
Wherever Slaking live, rings of over a yard in diameter appearnin grassy fields. They are made by the Pokémon as it eats allnthe grass within reach while lying prone on the ground.
草原に　刻まれた　半径　１メートルのn輪っかは　ケッキングが　寝そべったまま　周りのn草を　食べ尽くして　できた　ものだ。
